ygData.msgSnippet: I hate nWo.  I was not getting angry at Airly.  You re not on the council.  And I m DEFINATELY not gay, no matter what the other people at school say.  Way

I hate nWo.  I was not getting angry at Airly.  You're
not on the council.  And I'm DEFINATELY not gay, no
matter what the other people at school say.  Way back
when dinosaurs roamed the Earth, I was in
Kindergarden, and everyone else dreamed of being the
Red Ranger, I dreamed of doing the Pink and Yellow
Rangers, so I was straight back when most of you still
thought girls were "icky".

--- Eric Bischoff <1641coburn@...> wrote:
> OOC:  Look Kyle, you better shut up now.  First of
> all, everybody knows that you're hetrophobic.  I
> have nothing wrong with gay people.  But that's not
> the point.  I was using "faggot" as a general
> insult.  Err, that's not the point either.  The
> point is, the more that I look at the post, the more
> I see how you we're getting angry at Airly more than
> being helpful.  And, always remember, listen to the
> nWo, and don't try to fight us.
> 
>
